body_html:
Check out the answer on the google groups here: https://groups.google.com/a/tensorflow.org/forum/#!topic/discuss/bH6S98NpIJE

The short answer given by Rafal is:

You can initialize it randomly and afterwards do:
session.run(embedding.assign(my_word2vec_matrix))

You need to do separate assigns for the encoder and decoder.

body:
Check out the answer on the google groups here: https://groups.google.com/a/tensorflow.org/forum/#!topic/discuss/bH6S98NpIJE

The short answer given by Rafal is:

```
You can initialize it randomly and afterwards do:
session.run(embedding.assign(my_word2vec_matrix))

You need to do separate assigns for the encoder and decoder.
```
